summary.span: 表示用于填充 和更新 SQL Server 数据库的一组数据命令和一个数据库连接。

span.span: Represents a set of data commands and a database connection that are used to fill the and update a SQL Server database.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ，用作之间的桥梁和用于检索和保存数据的 SQL Server。The , serves as a bridge between a and SQL Server for retrieving and saving data. 通过映射提供此桥，这将更改中的数据以匹配数据源中的数据并，这将更改以匹配中的数据的数据源中的数据，并使用针对数据源的相应 TRANSACT-SQL 语句。The provides this bridge by mapping , which changes the data in the to match the data in the data source, and , which changes the data in the data source to match the data in the , using the appropriate Transact-SQL statements against the data source. 在由行的基础上执行更新。The update is performed on a by-row basis. 对于每个插入、 修改和已删除的行，方法确定已在其执行的更改的类型 (`Insert`， `Update`，或`Delete`)。For every inserted, modified, and deleted row, the method determines the type of change that has been performed on it (`Insert`, `Update`, or `Delete`). 具体取决于更改类型`Insert`， `Update`，或`Delete`命令模板执行传播到数据源的已修改的行。Depending on the type of change, the `Insert`, `Update`, or `Delete` command template executes to propagate the modified row to the data source. 当填充，它会创建所需的表和列返回的数据如果它们尚不存在。When the fills a , it creates the necessary tables and columns for the returned data if they do not already exist. 但是，主键信息不包含隐式创建的架构中除非属性设置为。However, primary key information is not included in the implicitly created schema unless the property is set to . 你还可能创建的架构，其中包括主键信息，与使用数据填充它之前`FillSchema`。You may also have the create the schema of the , including primary key information, before filling it with data using `FillSchema`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[将现有约束添加到数据集](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Adding Existing Constraints to a DataSet](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/adding-existing-constraints-to-a-dataset.md). 结合使用和以连接到 SQL Server 数据库时提高性能。 is used in conjunction with and to increase performance when connecting to a SQL Server database. > [!NOTE] > 如果您要通过 SQL Server 存储过程使用 `DataAdapter` 来编辑或删除数据，请确保不要在存储过程定义中使用 SET NOCOUNT ON。If you are using SQL Server stored procedures to edit or delete data using a `DataAdapter`, make sure that you do not use SET NOCOUNT ON in the stored procedure definition. 这将使返回的受影响的行数为零，`DataAdapter` 会将其解释为并发冲突。This causes the rows affected count returned to be zero, which the `DataAdapter` interprets as a concurrency conflict. 在这种情况下，将引发 。In this event, a will be thrown. 还包括， ， ， ，并属性以便于加载和更新的数据。The also includes the , , , , and properties to facilitate the loading and updating of data. 实例时创建读/写属性设置为初始值。When an instance of is created, the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ， ，和是通过参数机制从每个已修改的行的各个值自动填充的通用模板。The , , and are generic templates that are automatically filled with individual values from every modified row through the parameters mechanism. 每个列，则将传播到数据源上，应将参数添加到`InsertCommand`， `UpdateCommand`，或`DeleteCommand`。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to the `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. 属性的对象应设置为的列的名称。The property of the object should be set to the name of the column. 此设置表示参数的值不手动设置，但获取自当前处理的行中的特定列。This setting indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. > [!NOTE] > 仅当会调用方法和表包含在客户端计算机不可用的用户定义类型。An will occur if the method is called and the table contains a user-defined type that is not available on the client computer. 有关详细信息，请参阅[clr 用户定义类型](/sql/relational-databases/clr-integration-database-objects-user-defined-types/clr-user-defined-types)。For more information, see [CLR User-Defined Types](/sql/relational-databases/clr-integration-database-objects-user-defined-types/clr-user-defined-types). ## Examples 下面的示例使用， ，并若要从数据库中选择记录并填充与所选的行。The following example uses the , , and to select records from a database and populate a with the selected rows. 已填充然后返回。The filled is then returned. 若要完成此操作，该方法传递一个已初始化，连接字符串和是 TRANSACT-SQL SELECT 语句的查询字符串。To accomplish this, the method is passed an initialized , a connection string, and a query string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例时创建以下读/写属性设置为以下的初始值。When an instance of is created, the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values. |属性Properties|初始值Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 可以更改任何这些属性通过单独调用属性的值。You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和设置的某些属性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现构造函数设置属性中指定的值为`selectCommand`参数。This implementation of the constructor sets the property to the value specified in the `selectCommand` parameter. 实例时创建以下读/写属性设置为以下的初始值。When an instance of is created, the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values. |属性Properties|初始值Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 可以更改任何这些属性通过单独调用属性的值。You can change the value of any of these properties through a separate call to the property. 当（或任何其他命令属性） 分配到以前创建，则不克隆。When (or any of the other command properties) is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留对以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和设置的某些属性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.SqlDataAdapter1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.SqlDataAdapter1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.SqlDataAdapter1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.SqlDataAdapter1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现打开和关闭如果已打开。This implementation of the opens and closes a if it is not already open. 这很有用的应用程序必须调用中方法为两个或多个对象。This can be useful in an application that must call the method for two or more objects. 如果是尚未打开，您必须显式调用**关闭**或**释放**以将其关闭。If the is already open, you must explicitly call **Close** or **Dispose** to close it. 实例时创建以下读/写属性设置为以下的初始值。When an instance of is created, the following read/write properties are set to the following initial values. |属性Properties|初始值Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`| ||`MissingSchemaAction.Add`| 你可以通过属性单独调用这些属性的值。You can change the value of either of these properties through a separate call to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和设置的某些属性。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. summary.span: 获取或设置一个 Transact-SQL 语句或存储过程，以从数据集删除记录。

span.span: Gets or sets a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure to delete records from the data set.

value.span: 在 过程中使用 ，以在数据库中删除对应于 中已删除行的记录。

span.span: A used during to delete records in the database that correspond to deleted rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间，如果未设置此属性和主键信息是否处在，则如果您设置可以自动生成属性，然后使用。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然后，你未设置任何其他命令都由。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此生成逻辑要求要中存在的键列信息。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 当分配到以前创建，则不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留对以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. 每个列，则将传播到数据源上，应将参数添加到`InsertCommand`， `UpdateCommand`，或`DeleteCommand`。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to the `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. `SourceColumn`参数属性应设置为的列的名称。The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column. 这表示参数的值不手动设置，但获取自当前处理的行中的特定列。This indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，并设置， ， ，和属性。The following example creates a and sets the , , , and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes you have already created a object. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 Transact-SQL 语句或存储过程，以在数据源中插入新记录。

span.span: Gets or sets a Transact-SQL statement or stored procedure to insert new records into the data source.

value.span: 在 过程中使用 ，以在数据库中插入对应于 中的新行的记录。

span.span: A used during to insert records into the database that correspond to new rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间，如果未设置此属性和主键信息是否处在，则如果您设置可以自动生成属性，然后使用。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然后，你未设置任何其他命令都由。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此生成逻辑要求要中存在的键列信息。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 当分配到以前创建，则不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留对以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. 如果执行此命令返回的行，可以将这些行添加到具体取决于如何设置**UpdatedRowSource**属性的对象。If execution of this command returns rows, these rows can be added to the depending on how you set the **UpdatedRowSource** property of the object. 每个列，则将传播到数据源上，应将参数添加到`InsertCommand`， `UpdateCommand`，或`DeleteCommand`。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. `SourceColumn`参数属性应设置为的列的名称。The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column. 这表示参数的值不手动设置，但获取自当前处理的行中的特定列。This indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，并设置， ， ，和属性。The following example creates a and sets the , , , and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes you have already created a object. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlDataAdapter.Command/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Custom Event RowUpdated As SqlRowUpdatedEventHandler

summary.span: 在对数据源执行命令后的 过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during after a command is executed against the data source.

summary.span: 尝试进行更新，因此激发了该事件。

span.span: The attempt to update is made, so the event fires.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用，有两个事件发生每个更新的数据行。When using , there are two events that occur per data row updated. 执行顺序是按如下所示：The order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值移动到的参数值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 该命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果该命令设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`，第一个返回结果放置在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果没有输出参数，它们将放置。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何同时使用这两者和事件。The following example shows how to use both the and events. 事件返回以下输出：The event returns this output: 事件参数: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType = 2 状态 = 0)event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType=2 status=0) 事件返回以下输出：The event returns this output: 事件参数: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType = 2 recordsAffected = 1 row=System.Data.DataRow[37] 状态 = 0)event args: (command=System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand commandType=2 recordsAffected=1 row=System.Data.DataRow[37] status=0) [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdated Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

public override int UpdateBatchSize { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property UpdateBatchSize As Integer
public: virtual property int UpdateBatchSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.UpdateBatchSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置每次到服务器的往返过程中处理的行数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows that are processed in each round-trip to the server.
The number of rows to process per-batch.
Value is
Effect
There is no limit on the batch size..
Disables batch updating.

description.span: 更改是使用 操作的批处理一次性发送的。

span.span: Changes are sent using batches of operations at a time.

value.span: 当设置为 1 以外的值，与相关联的所有命令必须具有其**UpdatedRowSource**属性设置为或。

span.span: When setting this to a value other than 1, all the commands associated with the have to have their **UpdatedRowSource** property set to or .
An exception is thrown otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置一个值，该值启用或禁用批处理支持，并且指定可在一次批处理中执行的命令的数量。Gets or sets a value that enables or disables batch processing support, and specifies the number of commands that can be executed in a batch. 使用属性来更新数据源中的更改与。Use the property to update a data source with changes from a . 这可以通过减少到服务器的往返次数来提高应用程序性能。This can increase application performance by reducing the number of round-trips to the server. 执行极大的批处理会降低性能。Executing an extremely large batch could decrease performance. 因此，在实现应用程序前应进行测试以得到最佳的批大小。Therefore, you should test for the optimum batch size setting before implementing your application. 如果的值设置为一个数字，则引发小于零。An is thrown if the value is set to a number less than zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间，如果未设置此属性和主键信息是否处在，则如果您设置可以自动生成属性，然后使用。During , if this property is not set and primary key information is present in the , the can be generated automatically if you set the property and use the . 然后，你未设置任何其他命令都由。Then, any additional commands that you do not set are generated by the . 此生成逻辑要求要中存在的键列信息。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 当分配到以前创建，则不克隆。When is assigned to a previously created , the is not cloned. 保留对以前创建的引用对象。The maintains a reference to the previously created object. > [!NOTE] > 如果执行此命令返回的行，可能会与合并已更新的行具体取决于如何设置**UpdatedRowSource**属性的对象。If execution of this command returns rows, the updated rows may be merged with the depending on how you set the **UpdatedRowSource** property of the object. 每个列，则将传播到数据源上，应将参数添加到`InsertCommand`， `UpdateCommand`，或`DeleteCommand`。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. `SourceColumn`参数属性应设置为的列的名称。The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column. 这表示参数的值不是手动设置，但获取自当前处理的行中的特定列。This indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，并设置， ，和属性。The following example creates a and sets the , , and properties. 它假定你已创建对象。It assumes you have already created a object.
